story.text: LOS ANGELES Jan 3 Medarex Inc. MEDX.O said on Wednesday it received a milestone payment from its licensing partner, ImClone Systems Inc. IMCL.O, after U.S. regulators cleared the way for human trials of its experimental antibody that targets platelet-derived growth factor receptor alpha for the treatment of cancer. Medarex said the Phase I clinical trial is currently under way and expects to enroll 30 to 40 patients with solid tumors at two clinical sites in the United States.
story.title: medarex gets milestone payment from imclone
